properties.areaDesc: Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 4:45AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds to 40 knots and waves
10 to 14 feet expected. For the Small Craft Advisory,
northeast winds to 30 knots and waves 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Hamlin Beach
to Mexico Bay.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 AM to 4 PM EST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 9 AM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 4 PM EST SUNDAY
